setLogError

public RedirectorElement<P> setLogError(boolean val)
Controls whether error output of exec is logged. This is only useful when output is being redirected and error output is desired in the Ant log.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.RedirectorElement.setLogError)

setAppend

public RedirectorElement<P> setAppend(boolean val)
Whether output should be appended to or overwrite an existing file. Defaults to false.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.RedirectorElement.setAppend)

setAlwaysLog

public RedirectorElement<P> setAlwaysLog(boolean val)
If true, (error and non-error) output will be "teed", redirected as specified while being sent to Ant's logging mechanism as if no redirection had taken place. Defaults to false.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.RedirectorElement.setAlwaysLog)

setCreateEmptyFiles
